subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Encroaching on traditional European territory, the United States took a commanding lead and needs 4 ½ points from Sunday’s 12 singles matches to win the Ryder Cup.
snippet: Encroaching on traditional European territory, the United States took a commanding lead and needs 4 ½ points from Sunday’s 12 singles matches to win the Ryder Cup.
